text.title: Make Food That Will Help Fight Lead Exposure
text.head: Make Food That Will Help Fight Lead Exposure
text.p: Lead exposure can be prevented by changing your diet and consuming 3 important nutrients everyday. Calcium, Vitamin C, and Iron are key nutrients to help prevent lead exposure. Calcium strengthens bones, which makes it less likely for lead to be absorbed. Vitamin C helps your kidneys get rid of lead. Calcium and Vitamin C, along with Iron can prevent lead from being absorbed into your body. The specific foods listed below contain these nutrients. Consuming small meals like these throughout the day can ensure that you're receiving enough of these nutrients.
text.head: Steps
French Toast

list.item: Mix 1 egg, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract, and ½ a teaspoon of cinnamon into a bowl
Stir in ¼ cup of milk.
Dip bread into the mixture, coating both sides evenly
Lightly grease a nonstick pan
Cook bread slices on medium heat until both sides are browned
OPTIONAL: Serve with maple syrup or top it off with banana slices or any other fruit as they provide Vitamin C and other beneficial nutrients.

text.head: Pizza Bagels

list.item: Preheat your oven to 375 degrees
Slice open a bagel and place it on a pan. Breads provide iron to the body.
Spread 2 tablespoons of tomato sauce onto the bagels
Add shredded cheese (or a cheese slice) onto each bagel. Cheese is another source of calcium.
OPTIONAL: Add toppings such as pepperoni for taste. Any lean meat is also great source for iron.
Bake in oven for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted

text.head: Strawberry Banana Smoothie

list.item: Add 2 cups of frozen strawberries and 1 peeled banana into a blender. It's best to cut the tops of the strawberries first. The fruits provide Vitamin C.
Add one cup of milk (almond is preferred) and one cup of ice. The ice makes for a thicker smoothie. Milk is an excellent source of calcium and strengthens bones.
OPTIONAL: add a dollop of yogurt (another source of Vitamin C) or a tablespoon of honey for taste
Pulse in blender until all ingredients are combined
Pour into a cup and enjoy!

text.head: Ingredients For French Toast

list.item: 1 Egg
1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1/2 Teaspoon Cinnamon
4 Slices of Bread
Vegetable Oil
Bananas (Optional)
Maple Syrup (Optional)

text.head: Ingredients For Pizza Bagels

list.item: 1 Bagel
2 Tablespoons Tomato Sauce
Shredded Cheese or Sliced Cheese
Pepperoni (Optional)

text.head: Ingredients For Strawberry Banana Smoothie

list.item: 2 Cups Frozen Strawberries
1 Banana
1 Cup Milk (Almond preferred)
1 Cup Ice
Yogurt (Optional)
1 Tablespoon Honey (Optional)

text.head: Tips

list.item: Don't add all ingredients for the smoothie at once, or else they may get stuck. Try adding in the ice after blending the fruit and milk if this happens.
Be sure to watch the bottom of bagels to make sure they don't burn.
Watch out for the blender blade and make sure to keep lid on when pulsing the blender.
Don't grease the pan for the french toast too much.
Yogurts and fruits are rich in Vitamin C
Milk and cheese are a great source in Calcium
Breads and lean meats contain Iron
